actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding a taxpayer bill of rights.

summary.text: Taxpayer Bill of Rights Resolution - Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that each taxpayer has the right to be informed, to be assisted, to be heard, to pay no more than the correct amount of tax, to an appeal, to certainty, to privacy, to confidentiality, to representation, and to a fair and just tax system.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding a taxpayer bill of rights.
